**12.6**
<br>
![](anb_oppgaver/12_6.png)
<br>

a.
\begin{equation}
m = \frac{A_0 (\theta-n)}{K_\theta-K_n}
\end{equation}
b.

\begin{equation}
K_0 = \frac{1}{1+r_f}[qK_\theta+(1-q)K_n]=\frac{}{}[] 
\end{equation}
Hvor
\begin{equation*}
q=\frac{1+r_f-n}{\theta-n}=... \\ (1-q)=\frac{\theta-1-r_f}{\theta-n} = ...
\end{equation*}
